shortdesc.ph: Callback when the camera focus area changes.
Callback when the camera focus area changes.
Callback when the camera focus area changes.

p.codeblock: final void Function(int x, int y, int width, int height)? onCameraFocusAreaChanged;
public virtual void OnCameraFocusAreaChanged(int x, int y, int width, int height)

section.p: This callback is triggered when the local user calls the method to change the focus position.
This callback is triggered when the local user calls to change the focus position.
This callback is triggered when the local user calls the method to change the focus position.
section.note: This callback is applicable to Android and iOS only.
This callback is applicable only to Android and iOS.
This callback is applicable to Android and iOS only.

plentry.pd: The x-coordinate of the changed focus area.

The width of the changed focus area.
